'''Radiant Spincrystal 136''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock a [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Flower Writing]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in [[Ancestral Temple]], [[Natlan]].
